original_text: Well reported of for good works; if she have brought up children, if she have lodged strangers, if she have washed the saints' feet, if she have relieved the afflicted, if she have diligently followed every good work.
korean_text: 선한 행실의 증거가 있어 혹은 자녀를 양육하며 혹은 나그네를 대접하며 혹은 성도들의 발을 씻으며 혹은 환난 당한 자들을 구제하며 혹은 모든 선한 일을 행한 자라야 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: Well reported of for good works
if she have brought up children
if she have washed the saints' feet
if she have relieved the afflicted
if she have diligently followed every good work
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그가 모든 좋은 일을 부지런히 따랐다면
